title: How do I set a song as a ringtone for incoming calls or new messages?
answer:
[Go to Files. Touch and hold an audio file and touch Set as > SIM 1 phone ringtone,SIM 2 phone ringtone, or Notification ringtone>Music,you can chage the ringtone for incoming calls]() 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111430)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111431)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111432)In main screen,settings>Audio profiles>Default notification>Musicï¼Œyou can change the ringtone for new messages 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111433)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111434)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111435)Long press the music file,choose Set as phone ringtones/notification ringtone 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111436)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111437)

 You also can enter Music,long press a song you choosed from the my playlists to set as ringtone for incoming calls 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111438)
